text:

author: Gracy :D ᴬᵈᶦᵖᵘʳᵘˢʰ🏹
text: #Prabhas's #Adipurush is based on #Ramayan, our Real History. It's not made up, by no means a propaganda, and certainly not a tool to use for political benefit. This attempt to make World know the Most Popular Chapter of the Great Indian Culture will Surely Succeed. @KTRTRS
